name: 2019 IEEE 4th International Conference on Big Data Analysis (ICBDA 2019)--Ei Compendex and Scopus
content: Publication: All accepted papers after proper registration and presentation, will be published in the ICBDA 2019 conference Proceedings, and reviewed by the IEEE Conference Publication Program for IEEE Xplore, Ei Compendex and Scopus. ++ ICBDA2018 has been included in the IEEE Xplore! Papers of ICBDA2017, ICBDA2016 are indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus!
